price: Mereka berkata, "Wahai ayah kami, sesungguhnya kami pergi berlomba-lomba dan kami tinggalkan Yūsuf di dekat barang-barang kami, lalu dia dimakan serigala dan kamu sekali-kali tidak akan percaya kepada kami, sekali pun kami adalah orang-orang yang benar".
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰٓأَبَانَآ إِنَّا ذَهَبۡنَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِندَ مَتَٰعِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ ٱلذِّئۡبُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُؤۡمِنٖ لَّنَا وَلَوۡ كُنَّا صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāabānā innā dhahabnā nastabiqu wataraknā yūsufa ʿinda matāʿinā fa-akalahu al-dhi'bu wamā anta bimu'minin lanā walaw kunnā ṣādiqīna
